title: When will Eminem's next album be released? - Quora

response.answer_text: This might actually happen sooner than we think. Here’s why. In the past when Em released freestyles and cyphers it has been a warmup for something else. For example when CXVPHER dropped it was just about 2 weeks before the release of ShadyXV. This also happened with the Southpaw freestyle when it got dropped the day before the Southpaw Soundtrack. Now about 2 weeks ago he dropped Campaign Speech and if the pattern repeats itself, we should probably hear something very soon. Also the A&R for both Joe Budden and Royce has hinted at a single releasing very soon. Although this can’t be confirmed, the ties to shady records makes it a very real possibility. Hopefully we hear something in the next week from a more reliable source. My guess would be that if a single were to drop anytime soon, it would be on election day to continue with the campaign speech theme.

Thanks for A2A.....Yeah, even I had heard of this news, may be it's simply a rumour but I had heard that Eminem is going to launch his new album this year 2016.....actually the reason for this rumour or so-called news of launching his new album was that you might have known that Eminem recently went for a show trip, and this show trip he had planned out from his very busy schedule.....'Busy Schedule'-Eminem is busy, so that means He was working on something; and so much hard work he only does for music and songs...so from this fact we can assume that may be Eminem is going to launch his new album. I wish only one thing that if it would be his last album, then It should be like any one of those 'Slim Shady LP', 'Marshall Mathers LP', 'The Eminem Show', these three albums are really classis, fantastic, and superv, and also some songs if had the taste of chopping style it wouldn't be going too bad. Lets Hope for the best, this We fans can do...... Thanks!!!!!!!!!

Eminem has started collaborating with a lot of artists. There have been leaks and rumors surfacing the internet.  He is bringing back Dr. Dre and a likely collaboration with Kendrick Lamar and Rihanna is in the air.The Weeknd, Adele, Kid Cudi are other artists rumored to be brought in his new album titled, Success!The new album is set to release on September this year although there are speculations that it could be delayed till January, 2018. Hope this answers your question. Sources: Eminem new album news: ‘Success’ track list leaked; ‘Rap God’ rapper partners with Big Sean for ‘I Decided' album Eminem, Rihanna release fifth collaboration song in ‘Success’ album?

Yeah, one thing is sure a new album is coming and it's rumored to be “success”. The release of new album was confirmed when he posted on facebook about his campaign speech and wrote “ I am Working on a Album, here is something meanwhile”. There are also rumours that there are collaborations with Adele for the theme song and with chance the rapper.The release date is not yet declared but it will probably some time in the second half of this year, sometime around August.

As far as date is concerned, there cannot be a specific one. But looking at recent trends on his album launches and way the rumours have started about a new album with Dr. Dre mid of the calendar, I can bet my money on November. Many artists launch new tracks from October ends to mid November so I'm counting on that fact for this one. Hope for another classic with Dr. Dre himself this time!

According to online Hip Hop news websites currently Dr Dre and Eminem are working on ems new Album and it is expected to release this year or next year. After this news, every eminem fan is excited and want to hear it ASAP.

Well here goes a good news for you man, it has been said that Eminem is most likely to drop his new album in 2017. I'm not that much of a fan of his so you might be interested in this that it will be available by the end of this year.

Whenever he says the album is coming out…. add about 6 months to that. Big name musicians are notorious for promising albums that come late. I’ll expect an Eminem album to drop when I see it on Spotify.
By next album I assume you are referring to “Revival”. Most probably it will be released on 15th Dec2017 Yay \m/ Source : Eminem Officially Confirms His New Album 'Revival' Is On The Way
Just day before yesterday I read an article which read that his latest album is rumored to be released in the 4th quarter of this year.
his very LAST album will come out sometime after his death………which has not occured………yet.
There's no official release date yet but rumors are saying Christmas.
